title: Smart looking font
content:
May be a bit difficult, anybody here know what font was used to write PLR and FDP.  
Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120703011131im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Logo_FDP_neu_3816.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120703011131im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Nouveau_logo_PLR_F_6536.png)
author: MaxY

comments.content:
Hi Max,

maybe small-caps from Minion Bold/Black? [Minion](http://web.archive.org/web/20120703011131/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Minion) is/was a [Multiple Master](http://web.archive.org/web/20120703011131/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Multiple%20Master) font, hence it could be a custom style.  
F

You're right, florian. Minion Pro Bold Small Caps, hence the F seems to be custom.  
Thanks a lot !
